member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPage
member.summary: An optional interface which may be implemented by property pages hosted inside the Project Designer. Implementing this interface allows the page to participate in advanced scenarios supported by the Project Designer (for instance, automatic Undo and Redo functionality). However, (or ) is still required.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPage.FinishPendingValidations
member.summary: Completes all pending validations before continuing.
member.returns: true to continue, false to cancel the action that triggered the validation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPage.GetProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the current value for the given property.
member.returns: The value of the property.
member.param: The name of the property to get.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPage.GetPropertyMultipleValues(System.String,System.Object[]@,System.Object[]@)
member.summary: Gets the current values for the given property for each of the supplied configurations.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns , otherwise an error code.
member.param: The name of the property to get.
[out] Returns an array of configurations that may be affected.
[out] Returns an array of values for each of the configurations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPage.OnActivated(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Raised when the property page is activated or deactivated as the active designer.
member.param: true if the page has been activated, false if it has been deactivated.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPage.SetProperty(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the given value for the given property.
member.param: The name of the property.
The value to set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPage.SetPropertyMultipleValues(System.String,System.Object[],System.Object[])
member.summary: Sets the given values for the given properties, one for each of the supplied configurations.
member.param: The name of the property.
The configurations in which to set the property.
The values to set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPage.SetSite(Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPageSite)
member.summary: Notifies the property page of the site.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPage.SupportsMultipleValueUndo(System.String)
member.summary: Determines the given property supports getting and setting multiple values at the same time.
member.returns: true if the given property supports getting and setting multiple values at the same time.
member.param: The name of the property.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPageSite
member.summary: An interface which is implemented (in addition to ) by the Project Designer on sites that host property pages. It is necessary for some advanced scenarios supported by the Project Designer (for instance, automatic Undo and Redo), but it is not necessary to use this interface in order to be hosted as a property page in the Project Designer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPageSite.GetTransaction(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a transaction to group multiple property changes into a single undo/redo unit.
member.param: The description of the transaction.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPageSite.OnPropertyChanged(System.String,System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Raised after a property on the property page has changed.
member.param: The name of the property whose value has changed.
A that applies to the property.
The previous value of the property.
The new value of the property.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.ProjectDesigner.IVsProjectDesignerPageSite.OnPropertyChanging(System.String,System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor)
member.summary: Raised before a property value is changed.
member.param: The name of the property to be changed.
A that applies to the property.

member.summary: Gets whether or not the file is a data file.

member.summary: Gets whether or not the file cannot be mapped to an item in the project.
member.returns: true if the file cannot be mapped to an item in the project; false if it can be mapped.

member.returns: true if the file is a prerequisite for deployment, otherwise false.

member.summary: Gets whether or not the file is to be deployed.

member.summary: Gets the name of the file.

member.summary: Defines the properties of a published application.

member.summary: Gets or sets the revision number of the application.
member.returns: The revision number of the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.ApplicationVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the application.
member.returns: The version of the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.AutorunEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to create an autorun.ini file for this application.
member.returns: true if an autorun.ini file should be created for this application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.BootstrapperComponentsLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the way the bootstrapper should download components.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.BootstrapperDownloadUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL from which to download bootstrapper components of this application.
member.returns: The URL from which to download bootstrapper components of this application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.BootstrapperEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the bootstrapper should be generated.
member.returns: true if the bootstrapper should be generated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.BootstrapperPackages
member.summary: Gets the collection of bootstrapper packages.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.CreateWebPageOnPublish
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to generate a Web page when this application is published.
member.returns: true if a Web page should be created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.DisallowUrlActivation
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to run the application after installation
member.returns: true if the application should be started after installation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.Install
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to install the application on the user's machine.
member.returns: true to install the application on the user's machine.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.InstallFrom
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of install location.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.InstallUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL from which the user should install the application.
member.returns: The URL from which the user should install the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.MapFileExtensions
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to add ".deploy" as an extension to all deployed files.
member.returns: true to add ".deploy" as an extension to all deployed files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.MinimumRequiredVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum version users can install.
member.returns: The minimum version users can install.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.OpenBrowserOnPublish
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to open the default browser after each publish.
member.returns: true to open the default browser every time the application is published.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.ProductName
member.summary: Gets and sets the name of the application.
member.returns: The name of the application that will be displayed on the installation program.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.PublisherName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the publisher.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.SupportUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to which users can go for support.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties.TargetCulture
